title: Coming out of the Rain
description: David is back home for summer after his freshman year in college. When he has to walk home in the rain after a party, he's very happy to see Josh, his older brother's best friend. David has always had a thing for Josh, and when Josh offers to let David stay the night, things quickly get heated between them.This 11000 word erotic story contains a college freshman, an older graduate happy to share his experience, masturbation, some manhandling, oral sex and first time anal sex. For ADULT readers only. All sex takes place between consenting adults.
author: Calandra Hunter
